Body.Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass 7i), aluminum frame, aluminum back
Body.SIM: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time)
Body.\u00a0:
IP64 dust tight and water resistant (water splashes)
RGB notification light & active matrix display (on the back)

Platform.OS: Android 16, up to 3 major Android upgrades, XOS 16
Platform.CPU: Octa-core (1x2.7 GHz Cortex-A720 & 3x2.4 GHz Cortex-A720 & 4x1.8 GHz Cortex-A520)

Main Camera.Dual:
50 MP, f/1.6, (wide), 0.8µm, PDAF, OIS
8 MP, f/2.2, 112˚ (ultrawide), 1.12µm

Sound.\u00a0:
Tuned by JBL
24-bit/192kHz Hi-Res & Hi-Res wireless audio

Features.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, heart rate, SpO2

Battery.Charging:
90W wired, 50% in 16 min, 100% in 41 min (6500 mAh)
90W wired, 50% in 14 min, 100% in 35 min (6000 mAh)
30W wireless
7.5W reverse wired
5W reverse wireless
Bypass Charging (gaming, navigating)

Misc.Colors: Mist Titanium, Deep Ocean Blue, Solar Orange, Mocha Brown, Torino Black, Frost Silver
